newsitem.title: USA: Calton delays filing annual report.
newsitem.headline: Calton delays filing annual report.

text.p: Calton Inc said on Tuesday that it has deferred filing its year-end financial statements for 1996 until it amends its credit facility.
The company's credit facility has been extended to April 15, 1997 from March 31, 1997 so the company could amend the facility to extend the term through February 1998 and possibly August 1998.
The company would have to meet certain milestones for the August extension, Calton said.
Calton said the company's disclosures for capital resources and liquidity cannot be made final until negotiations with the lenders are complete.
No assurances can be given that an amended facility will be executed on terms and conditions favorable to the company, Calton said.
